name: chsssh

body.origin:
|- wss(cch, csh)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs0), csh))
-| diffsc(hs0, cch)
-| diffsc(hs0, csh)
body.pretty:
⊢ CH ⊆ SH
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CH → hs0 ∈ SH)
⊣ d(hs0, CH)
⊣ d(hs0, SH)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cch, csh)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs0), csh))
-| diffsc(hs0, cch)
-| diffsc(hs0, csh)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CH ⊆ SH
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CH → hs0 ∈ SH)
⊣ d(hs0, CH)
⊣ d(hs0, SH)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cch, csh)
-| diffsc(hs0, cch)
-| diffsc(hs0, csh)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CH ⊆ SH
⊣ d(hs0, CH)
⊣ d(hs0, SH)

comment: Closed subspaces are subspaces in a Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 29-May-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
